about.title: About Community Compass
about.subtitle: Empowering communities through accessible, comprehensive resource discovery
about.visionText: At Community Compass, we celebrate the power of connection and community support. We believe that everyone deserves easy access to the resources and services that can help them thrive. Our platform serves as a bridge between those in need and the local organizations dedicated to making a difference.
about.visionText2: Through thoughtfully curated information and intuitive design, we're building a comprehensive directory that empowers individuals, families, and communities to discover and access the support they need‚Äîall in one place.
about.missionText: Community Compass is dedicated to creating a centralized, accessible platform where community resources are easily discoverable and navigable. We aim to:
about.missionItem1: Connect individuals with local support services across all categories
about.missionItem2: Provide comprehensive, up-to-date information about community resources
about.missionItem3: Foster community engagement through resource sharing and discovery
about.missionItem4: Make resource discovery intuitive, accessible, and user-friendly
about.compassionText: We approach every interaction with empathy and understanding, recognizing that everyone's journey is unique.
about.communityText: We believe in the strength of community and the power of coming together to support one another.
about.accessibilityText: We're committed to making resources accessible to everyone, regardless of background or circumstance.
about.joinUsText: Help us expand our directory by submitting resources, sharing feedback, or getting involved in your community.
about.footerText: Connecting communities with the resources they need. Your guide to local support services.

footer.tagline: Connecting communities with the resources they need. Your guide to local support services.
footer.visionText: At Community Compass, we believe everyone deserves access to the support services they need. We're building a comprehensive directory that empowers communities to discover, connect, and access local resources effortlessly.

helper.title: Community Helper
helper.subtitle: Ask me anything!
helper.greeting: Hi! I'm your Community Compass helper. How can I assist you today? You can ask me about finding resources, using the map, or getting help with any feature!
helper.searchQuestion: How do I search for resources effectively?
helper.categoriesQuestion: What types of resources can I find?
helper.searchResponse:
You can search for resources in several ways:

‚Ä¢ **Keyword Search**: Use the search bar to find specific resources by name, description, or tags
‚Ä¢ **Category Filters**: Select multiple categories to filter results (you can choose more than one!)
‚Ä¢ **Location Filter**: Toggle between local resources (within ~200 miles) or all resources
‚Ä¢ **Favorites**: Save frequently used resources for quick access

Pro tip: Try combining search terms with category filters for the best results!
helper.categoriesResponse:
Community Compass includes these resource categories:

‚Ä¢ **Food Assistance** - Food banks, meal programs, nutrition help
‚Ä¢ **Healthcare** - Clinics, medical services, health programs
‚Ä¢ **Housing** - Shelter, rental assistance, housing support
‚Ä¢ **Employment** - Job training, career services, employment help
‚Ä¢ **Education** - Tutoring, GED programs, educational resources
‚Ä¢ **Senior Services** - Programs for older adults
‚Ä¢ **Mental Health** - Counseling, therapy, mental health support
‚Ä¢ **Legal Aid** - Legal assistance, court help
‚Ä¢ **Transportation** - Ride services, transit help
‚Ä¢ **Child Care** - Daycare, after-school programs
‚Ä¢ **Veterans Services** - Programs for veterans
‚Ä¢ **Financial Assistance** - Money help, financial aid

Select multiple categories in the filter to see all relevant resources!
helper.mapResponse:
The interactive map helps you visualize resource locations:

‚Ä¢ **Map View**: See all resources plotted on an interactive map
‚Ä¢ **Density View**: Toggle heatmap to see resource concentration
‚Ä¢ **Local Filter**: Focus on resources within ~200 miles
‚Ä¢ **Click Resources**: Select any map pin to see detailed information
‚Ä¢ **Zoom & Pan**: Navigate the map to explore different areas

The map is especially helpful for planning visits to multiple resources!
helper.favoritesResponse:
Favorites help you keep track of useful resources:

‚Ä¢ **Save Resources**: Click the heart icon on any resource to save it
‚Ä¢ **Quick Access**: Your favorites appear in a special filtered view
‚Ä¢ **Sync Across Devices**: Favorites are tied to your account
‚Ä¢ **Remove Favorites**: Click the heart again to remove from favorites

Perfect for resources you use regularly or want to remember!
helper.submitResponse:
Know a resource that should be listed? Submit it!

‚Ä¢ **Add Resource**: Use the "Add Resource" page to submit new listings
‚Ä¢ **Review Process**: All submissions are reviewed before being published
‚Ä¢ **Required Info**: Include contact details, services offered, and location
‚Ä¢ **Help Community**: Your submissions help others find needed resources

We appreciate community contributions to keep our database comprehensive!
helper.defaultResponse:
